cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.1)

include (ExternalProject)

set (GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT gzstream-git)
message (${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
set (GZSTREAM_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}-prefix/src/${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT})

ExternalProject_Add (
  ${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}
  GIT_REPOSITORY "https://github.com/danielsuo/gzstream.git"
  BUILD_IN_SOURCE 1
  GIT_TAG "master"
  UPDATE_COMMAND ""
  CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
  BUILD_COMMAND make
  INSTALL_COMMAND ""
  )

set (GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT ${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT} PARENT_SCOPE)
set (GZSTREAM_INCLUDE_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}-prefix/src/${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT} PARENT_SCOPE)
set (GZSTREAM_LIBRARY_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}-prefix/src/${GZSTREAM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT} PARENT_SCOPE)
